name: Crystal Skull
overview: Lost for a 1000 years, the Crystal Skull is said to bestow upon the owner magical powers and internal life. After 20 years of searching, you, Dr. Indiana Smith have finally tracked it’s whereabouts down to one of four Aztec pyramids in the Amazon Basin. To retrieve it should be easy, except the Aztecs who built the pyramids don't want it stolen by a grave robbers and have built a few surprises into the pyramids to keep unwanted guests out. They shouldn't be a problem, should they?
